text.text_translated:
Asteroids are big rocks in space. Some asteroids are dangerous. NASA calls them 'Potentially Hazardous Asteroids'. They pass close to Earth's orbit. They are less than 7.5 million kilometres away.

NASA made a map of these asteroids. There are 1,400 of them. But they are not a danger now. They will not be a danger for 100 years.

NASA has technology to watch them. NASA can predict if an asteroid will hit Earth. Then, NASA has two ways to defend Earth.
